privacyPolicy.title: Privacy Policy
privacyPolicy.description:
We collect information about users to provide better service and ensure the security of the service through monitoring.

We do not share information with third parties for any commercial purposes. We do not use third-party tracking cookie services for information collection.

Information we collect:
  • Your IP address.
  • The country you are accessing from.
  • User agent, i.e., your browser and operating system.
  • Information you enter into the service.

    • What information we do not collect:
  • Information based on third-party tracking cookies.
  • Any personal information, including email addresses and phone numbers.

    • The collected information is processed by the Finnish Defence Forces and personnel authorized by the Finnish Defence Forces, under the guidance of the FDF.
    The information is stored in the EU.

    By using the service, you agree to the collection of the information described above.
callsignsetup-callsign-min: The minimum length for the callsign is 3 characters
callsignsetup-callsign-max: The maximum length for the callsign is 30 characters
callsignsetup-enter-callsign-detail: The callsign is your identifier in the services. Provide the callsign you have been assigned to.
enrollment-approved: You have been approved for the service.
awaiting-approval: You are in the Waiting Room!
copy-link-admin: Copy the approval link to the administrator
waiting-approval-instruction: You are awaiting your administrator to approve you to the services. Show them the QR code below, or press 'Copy Link' and send them the approval link.
approval-instruction-intro: You are waiting administrator to approve you to the service. Approval can occur in one of these three ways:
approval-instruction-qr: Your administrator scans the QR code above from your screen. It contains the approval link, which the admin can access.
approval-instruction-copy: You may copy and send the approval link to your administrator, using a trusted method, such as email or an app.
approval-instruction-send: Just send your approval code to your administrator, who will enter it into their approval view.
mtls-description:
By using an mTLS key installed on your device to connect to our service, we can ensure the connection comes from you. No one else can impersonate you. Likewise, you are assured that on the other end, it's us.

All services from Rasenmaeher that you take into use, encrypt their traffic with your mTLS key.
mtls-download-install-title: Download and install the mTLS Certificate
mtls-download-install-description: You can use the service only, if your device has a mTLS Certificate of this server installed to your device. Download and install the key to your device.
navigate-with-your-key: Use your key to access the services
mac-instructions.download-key.title: 1. Download Your Key
mac-instructions.download-key.descriptio: Press the Download Key button. You will receive a file named yourcallsign.pfx.
mac-instructions.open-key.title: 2. Open Your Key
mac-instructions.open-key.description1: a. Open your downloads folder and double-click the file. Mac Keychain will open.
mac-instructions.open-key.description2: b. Keychain Access will ask for your Mac username and password. Enter them and press OK.
mac-instructions.open-key.description3:
c. You will be asked for the password of the item (key). The password is always your callsign just as it is.
In the example, the password is PROGRAMMFEHLERMAEHER4.
If asked, where to save the keychain, the answer is System.
mac-instructions.set-key.title: 3. Set Up Your Key
mac-instructions.set-key.description1:
a. Select 1. System from the left bar of Mac Keychain. In the System view, at first, select 2. Certificates from the top bar.

In the Certificates view, find a certificate named after your callsign. double-click your certificate 'yourcallsign' and choose Trust - Always Trust. Then follow the next guided changes in the Keys menu.
mac-instructions.set-key.description2: b. Double-click your key YourCallsign.pfx. Select Access Control. Enter your Mac username and password.
mac-instructions.set-key.description3: c. Choose the option Allow all applications to access this item, and save the changes. When asked, enter your Mac username and password.
mac-instructions.set-key.description4: Your key is now set up! Press the Navigate to the service button.
android-instructions.step1.title: 1. Download and Open Your Key
android-instructions.step1.description: Press the Download Key button. The key will download, and a dialog will ask for a password. The password is always yourcallsign.
android-instructions.step2.title: 2. Set Your Key
android-instructions.step2.description1: The window asks for the certificate type. It is a VPN and app usage certificate.
android-instructions.step2.description2: The window prompts you to name the certificate. Your callsign is prefilled. Do not change the name, just press OK.
android-instructions.step3.title: 3. Access the Service with Your Key
android-instructions.step3.description1: You are now ready! When you press the Access the Service button, the browser will ask which certificate you want to use. Press OK.
android-instructions.step3.description2: After this, you can always access the service with your key. You don't need passwords because the service recognizes you by your key.
ios-instructions.step1.title: 1. Download Your Key
ios-instructions.step1.description1: Press the Download Key button. Your device will ask, if you want to allow a profile to be downloaded. Press Allow.
ios-instructions.step1.description2: Your device will notify you that the key has been downloaded.
ios-instructions.step2.title: 2. Open Your Key
ios-instructions.step2.description1: Swipe down from the middle of the screen, and type profile into the search field that appears. Select VPN and Device Management.
ios-instructions.step2.description2: In the VPN and Device Management menu, select the Downloaded Profile Personal Certificate - this is the key you just downloaded.
ios-instructions.step3.title: 3. Set Your Key
ios-instructions.step3.description1: After selecting the key, your device will ask for your passcode. Enter it.
ios-instructions.step3.description2: The device gives a warning. Press Install in the top right corner.
ios-instructions.step3.description3: The device will ask for the password for this key. The password is always the callsign you provided, for example, FIGHTER1.
ios-instructions.step3.description4: After a successful password entry, the device will announce that the profile, i.e., the key, is installed. Then return to the Rasenmaeher app in your browser. There, press the Access the service with your key button.
ios-instructions.step3.description5: The browser states that the application requires a client certificate (this will be the key you just installed). Press Continue.
ios-instructions.step3.description6:
Your key is now set up! From now on, whenever you reach Rasenmaeher, the service will recognize you by your key.

If you end up on the login page, press the "I have a key" button.
windows-instructions.step1.title: 1. Download Key
windows-instructions.step1.description: Press the Download Key button. You'll download the key. Open the key from your browser's Downloads menu, or from the notification popup.
windows-instructions.step2.title: 2. Install Key
windows-instructions.step2a.description: a. Double-click on the key file 'YourCallsign.pfx'. The key installation program will start. Choose Store Location as Local User.
windows-instructions.step2b.description: b. The installation program will ask for the file. It is pre-filled, so press Next.
windows-instructions.step2c.description:
c. Next, you will be asked for a password. It is always your callsign, for example, BEAR10.

For the Import options inquiry, only fill in Include all extended properties and press Next.
windows-instructions.step2d.description: d. In the Certificate Store menu, let the default selection stand, i.e., choose Automatic.
windows-instructions.step2e.description: e. The key installation is complete! Press Finish.
windows-instructions.step2f.description: The installation program will give a notification of successful installation.
windows-instructions.step3.title: 3. Access the Service with Your Key
windows-instructions.step3a.description: You are now ready! When you press the Access the Service button, the browser will ask which certificate you want to use. Press OK.
windows-instructions.step3b.description: After this, you can always access the service. You do not need passwords because the service recognizes you by your mTLS key.
adminHomeView.manageUsers:
Tap Manage users to enrol and manage users. The services available in this deployment are listed below.

Tap a service's icon below to get using it on your device.
